statements: DELETE FROM user_locations WHERE ST_DWithin(location, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1 1)'), 10);
DELETE FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 123 AND ST_X(location) < 10;
DELETE FROM user_locations WHERE ST_X(location) > 50 AND user_id = 456;
DELETE FROM check_ins WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_locations WHERE location_name = 'Home');
DELETE FROM check_ins WHERE user_id = 2 AND location_id = 5;
DELETE FROM check_ins WHERE user_id = 10 AND location_id = 5;
DELETE FROM check_ins WHERE location_id = 5 AND user_id = 10;
DELETE FROM locations WHERE latitude < 40.0 AND longitude > -100.0;
DELETE FROM locations WHERE latitude = 37.7749 AND longitude = -122.4194;
